RelatedSentence: Talks in Brussels over Norway 's contribution to the European Union broke up without a conclusion on Friday after Norwegian negotiators declared that the gap between Norway 's view and the amount that European Union officials are demanding was too large to be bridged .

Talks in Brussels over Norway 's contribution to the European Union broke up without a conclusion on Friday after Norwegian negotiators declared that the gap between Norway 's view and the amount that European Union officials are demanding was too large to be bridged .
